thread.section_title: Hotel Atmospheres - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A little treasure!
thread.title_full: A little treasure! - Review of Hotel Atmospheres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: CarpeDiiem324
title: A little treasure!
text:
I just returned from a week's stay at the Hotel Atmospheres. From check-in through check-out, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay! The front desk staff, especially Saad and Fourzia, were very helpful, warm, and professional. Our room ( the Sorbonne-2 twin beds street view) was not large but the space was well appointed. The bathroom was equipped with a magnifying mirror and the shower water pressure was divine! Complimentary water upon arrival, honor bar, afternoon coffee, tea and cake, and a fitness center were some of the other amenities. This hotel is 3 minutes walk to the Sorbonne and about 7 minutes to Notre Dame.
My only quibble: there could be heavier dumb bells in the fitness center!
